reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 200, MATH 217, MATH 226, MATH 253, MATH 263.
Co-reqs: One of ELEC 211, EECE 261.
FOR APPLIED SCIENCE STUDENTS ONLY. This section of MATH 264 is linked to EECE 261, Section 201.
FOR APPLIED SCIENCE STUDENTS ONLY. This section of MATH 264 is linked to EECE 261, Section 202.
description: Divergence, gradient, curl, theorems of Gauss and Stokes. Applications to Electrostatics and Magnetostatics. MATH 264 content is strongly coupled to ELEC 211 with topics and student evaluations weighted accordingly.
